content.html: I'm now seeing the reverse play out these days, as there's a worker shortage and those not given respect decide they don't have to put up with it. Our cleaner fired 25% of their clients and upon talking with them they were all ones treating them with no dignity.
content.value:
I'm now seeing the reverse play out these days, as there's a worker shortage and those not given respect decide they don't have to put up with it.

Our cleaner fired 25% of their clients and upon talking with them they were all ones treating them with no dignity.
